items.sentence: Tom was walking home from the library when he got hit by a truck.
Are you going with us, or are you going to stay here by yourself?
Do you know what Tom's favorite color was when he was a teenager?
Let me tell you something about Tom that you probably don't know.
This week, Tom will be in Boston. Next week, he'll be in Chicago.
Tom and Mary aren't husband and wife. They're brother and sister.
Tom has started asking his parents questions about what happened.
Tom started complaining about Mary again, but I told him to stop.
A female friend of ours took a trip to a small village last week.
Tom was so preoccupied that he was oblivious of his surroundings.
